name: Morrow (Beta)
description: THIS GAME IS IN BETA THERE WILL BE BUGS!!!!! Paranoia. Lost in the woods. You find a house. What's in that house. Why is there jazz music playing. Psychological horror game with no jumpscares, my challenge was to try and making a genuinely unsettling experience with zero jumpscares. Can you make it out of the woods alive. (Best played on headphones with the volume decently high for best experience).
